Question: 1.  __________ is a program created by Microsoft and has many tools that help us to create drawings and edit photos.
2.  File menu, Edit menu, View menu and Help menu are found in:
3.  __________ is used to create a new file, save, print, set as desktop background, etc.
4.  __________ is used to undo, redo, copy, paste, etc.
5.  __________ is used to display toolbox, colour box, status bar, text toolbar, zoom and view bitmap.
6.  __________ provides comprehensive help about the paint program.
7.  __________ is used to flip, stretch, invert colours among others.
8.  __________ is used to edit colours.
9.  Color eraser, Pick color, Pencil, Airbrush, etc., are found in:
10.  ___________ contains variety of colours that you will use for your drawings.
11.  ___________ is used to select a specific object which you can copy and paste in another location.
12.  ____________ picks the colour you want and makes it as the active colour.
13.  ____________ is used for erasing your drawing.
14.  ___________ is used to draw a line.
15.  ___________ is used for spraying your object with colour.
16.  ___________ is used to fill an object with colour at one go.
17.  ___________ is a zooming tool.
18.  ___________ is used for entering text.
19.  ___________ is used for drawing a polygon but still you can draw a lot of other objects.
20.  ___________ is used to draw a rectangle with rounded corners.
21.  To open MS Paint :
Option A: (a) Press Start key > Select Tux Paint
Option B: (b) Press Start key > Select MS Paint
Option C: (c) Go to File Explorer > Select Tux Paint
Option D: (d) Go to File Explorer > Select MS Paint
Answer: (b) Press Start key > Select MS Paint

Question: 22.  The tool which looks like a magnifying glass is __________.
23.  To make your drawing as your computer desktop background :
Option A: (a) Click on File > Set as Desktop Background
Option B: (b) Click on Edit > Set as Desktop Background
Option C: (c) Click on View > Set as Desktop Background
Option D: (d) Click on Home > Set as Desktop Background
Answer: (a) Click on File > Set as Desktop Background

Question: 24.  To add texts to your drawings, click the _______ icon on the Tools panel.
25.  To close Microsoft Paint :
Option B: (b) Click on X icon on the right top of the window
